steps.title: Make a powder of black pepper and jaggery.
steps.content: Make a powder of black pepper and jaggery. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Slice the piece of ginger into many small pieces.
steps.content: Slice the piece of ginger into many small pieces. Add the small slices of ginger into the powdered jaggery and black pepper.

steps.title: Open the cardamoms from the side and add it into the mixture of black pepper, ginger and jaggery.
steps.content: Open the cardamoms from the side and add it into the mixture of black pepper, ginger and jaggery.

steps.title: Add one-fourth inch of cinnamon stick, 2-3 cloves and one teaspoon fennel seeds into it.
steps.content: Add one-fourth inch of cinnamon stick, 2-3 cloves and one teaspoon fennel seeds into it.

steps.title: Add the mixture of jaggery, black pepper, cinnamon stick, cloves, fennel seeds, cardamom and ginger into 3-4 cups of hot water.
steps.content: Add the mixture of jaggery, black pepper, cinnamon stick, cloves, fennel seeds, cardamom and ginger into 3-4 cups of hot water. [2] X Research source

steps.title: Pour the mixture through a sieve.
steps.content: Pour the mixture through a sieve. [3] X Research source

steps.title: Keep the liquid and discard the rest.
steps.content: Keep the liquid and discard the rest. Add one teaspoon of coffee powder, stir well, and serve!
